home-page.title: 👋 Leander Rodrigues: Full-stack Dev | Tech Nerd | Dog Lover
home-page.description: Hey there, My name is Leander Rodrigues. I'm a full-stack web developer from Toronto, and this is my portfolio, blog and corner of the internet!

about-page.title: 🔥 (Not) Your average nerd
about-page.description: Want to know some more about me? Well I'm a Engineering Student at the University, I love sushi, Edgar Wright films, and doing cool stuff online.

projects-page.title: 🔨 I think I build some cool stuff
projects-page.description: I've done a bunch of fun development projects. React, Vue, Gatsby, Redux, Node, and a bunch more. Take a peek for some extra info!

blog-page.title: 📝 ️Writing is hard
blog-page.description: A few of my blog posts. I write about video games, movies, life, code, and probably a little too much about fonts.

notes-page.title: 📗 A few things I picked up
notes-page.description: Just a bit of my crazed scribblings. I write notes on development tips, for concepts and courses alike! Check them out!

resume-page.title: 👔 Resume - Leander Rodrigues
resume-page.description: My online portfolio! The TL;DR; of my life, including things like Work Experience, Projects, Education, and my Qualifications

contact-page.title: 📫 Hit me up!
contact-page.description: I'd love to hear from you! Questions, comments, pull requests, or just say hello! Does that sound desperate? Probably eh?
